categories: Category:Personnel of Ysanne Isard's Thyferran regime

nodes.text: Bors Kenlin was a male Human and the captain of the Bacta Tanker Xucphra Rose.

During the Bacta War, Kenlin was part of a convoy making a delivery of bacta and was attacked by the former members of Rogue Squadron, a New Republic starfighter squadron. Kenlin willingly went with them to the colony moon Halanit despite Ysanne Isard's, who was currently ruling the planet Thyferra, threat to kill the family members of those who surrendered. According to Kenlin, Isard would be doing him a favor by killing his wife.
